summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; approving preliminary plans for a planned unit development on an approximate 19-acre site zoned SF 5000 and SF 9600 located generally south of N.E. 50th Street and east of 49th Ave. N.E., adjacent to Lake Washington; and amending Plats 16E and 17W, Pages 64 and 65 Land Use Map of the City of Seattle.
